rules.name: Combat Doctrines
rules.lore: Regiments of numerous origins and tactical roles inculcate their soldiers from an early age with the legendary doctrines of the Tactica Imperium. Infantry and tank crews are drilled in close-range fire patterns in the expectation of being thrust into the front lines.
rules.text:
Ranged attacks from your +Regiment+ units that target visible units (excluding +Monster+ and +Vehicle+ units) have +[Lethal Hits]+.

 Ranged attacks from your +Squadron+ units that target visible +Monster+ or +Vehicle+ units have +[Lethal Hits]+

spells.name: Scion of the Codex
spells.effect: Select one friendly unit within 18". Until the end of the Battle Round, you may re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

spells.name: Fury of the Ancients
spells.effect: Select one visible enemy Model within 18". Draw a line between any part of this model's base and any part of the selected model's base (or hull). The selected model's unit, and every other enemy unit that this line passes over or through, suffers 1 Mortal Damage

spells.name: Psychic Fortress
spells.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, friendly units within 6" have a 5++ Invulnerable Save.

strategems.name: Reinforcements!
strategems.when: Immediately after a friendly +Regiment+ unit is destroyed
strategems.target: The friendly +Regiment+ unit that was just destroyed
strategems.effect: Place the destroyed +Regiment+ unit into Reserves, at its starting strength, with all models at full Health.

strategems.name: Fields of Fire
strategems.when: After a friendly +Regiment+ or +Squadron+ unit has finished its Shoot action
strategems.target: The enemy unit that was hit by those attacks
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, attacks made by friendly +Regiment+ or +Squadron+ units against the selected enemy unit have their Armor Break trait improved by 1 (unless the attacking unit is Battle-Shocked).
